greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array of binomial transforms of (0,0,1,0,0,0..........), read by antidiagonals.
comment: Rows are three-fold convolutions of sequences of powers. Rows include A038845, A027472, A081135, A081136, A027474, A081138, A081139, A081140, A081141, A081142. The main diagonal is A081131.
formula: T(n, k)=k^(n-2)C(n, 2). T(0, 0)=0. Rows have g.f. x^3/(1-kx)^n
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 08 2003
